statements: DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND phone_number = '555-123-4567';
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE billing_address LIKE '%New York%' AND billing_info IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM billing_info WHERE total_amount <= 1000)
DELETE FROM Orders WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customers WHERE email = 'example@example.com');
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000);
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 1 AND product_id = 1
